update.description:
This pull request doesn't add new functionality, just adds a new `world_playback` integration test for checking the playback control via messages.

There are still some cases uncovered by these tests where the logging doesn't work. Those cases will be added in a future pull request with the fixes for keeping the changes small.

There's a small fix in LogPlay::Open() that caused problems when opening two log files in a row (this happens during testing).

CI results:

  * [No GPU](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/642/)
  * [Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/487/#showFailuresLink)
  * [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/499/#showFailuresLink)
update.title: Playback testing

content.raw: Maybe we need to sleep more? Or check for the iterations periodically and have a high timeout in case it never reaches that?
content.html: Maybe we need to sleep more? Or check for the iterations periodically and have a high timeout in case it never reaches that?

content.raw:
I had test failures:

~~~
[ RUN      ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Forward/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.52
[Wrn] [LogPlay.cc:259] Unable to find <iterations>...</iterations> tags in the first chunk. Assuming that the first <iterations> value is 0.
[Msg] 
Log playback:
  Log Version: 1.0
  Gazebo Version: 6.0.0
  Random Seed: 27838
  Log Start Time: 28 457000000
  Log End Time: 31 745000000
[Wrn] [Publisher.cc:139] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/local/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:192] ServerFixture load in 1.8 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:202: Failure
Value of: this->expectedFinalIters
  Actual: 3290
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2368
[Wrn] [Publisher.cc:139] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/physics/contacts, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:192: Failure
Value of: this->expectedInitialIters
  Actual: 1
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2552
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:202: Failure
Value of: this->expectedFinalIters
  Actual: 3290
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2418
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:192: Failure
Value of: this->expectedInitialIters
  Actual: 1
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2612
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:118] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Forward/0, where GetParam() = "state.log" (14227 ms)
~~~
content.html:
I had test failures:

[ RUN      ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Forward/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.52
[Wrn] [LogPlay.cc:259] Unable to find <iterations>...</iterations> tags in the first chunk. Assuming that the first <iterations> value is 0.
[Msg] 
Log playback:
  Log Version: 1.0
  Gazebo Version: 6.0.0
  Random Seed: 27838
  Log Start Time: 28 457000000
  Log End Time: 31 745000000
[Wrn] [Publisher.cc:139] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/local/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:192] ServerFixture load in 1.8 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:202: Failure
Value of: this->expectedFinalIters
  Actual: 3290
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2368
[Wrn] [Publisher.cc:139] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/physics/contacts, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:192: Failure
Value of: this->expectedInitialIters
  Actual: 1
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2552
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:202: Failure
Value of: this->expectedFinalIters
  Actual: 3290
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2418
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/test/integration/world_playback.cc:192: Failure
Value of: this->expectedInitialIters
  Actual: 1
Expected: world->GetIterations()
Which is: 2612
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:118] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Forward/0, where GetParam() = "state.log" (14227 ms)

update.description:
This pull request doesn't add new functionality, just adds a new `world_playback` integration test for checking the playback control via messages.

There are still some cases uncovered by these tests where the logging doesn't work. Those cases will be added in a future pull request with the fixes for keeping the changes small.

There's a small fix in LogPlay::Open() that caused problems when opening two log files in a row (this happens during testing).

CI results:

  * [No GPU](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/642/)
  * [Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/487/#showFailuresLink)
  * [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/499/#showFailuresLink)
update.title: Playback testing
